value:
Countries that are open with others
are great. That's how my country's
gonna be too!

The Order always seems to have
some festival going on... I'm jealous!
I'll have to start some in Jötunheimr!

The air this thing can move is mighty
impressive! Watch it, or it could send
you flying, $Nu!

You know where I can find a good
spot to fly a kite? The more open
space, the better.

This outfit is awesome, right?!
I love it! I can't wait for Reginn
to see it too.

Hey! It's me, Dagr! How's it goin'?
I'm here with this gift for you, from
$Nf... *wink*

Whew! This is a breeze! I've just
gotta keep up this pace.

That's a nice breeze... Seems like
a good sign. It's my time!

Hm... I can't seem to catch the
wind right now.

For me? Thank you! I won't blow
this opportunity!

Heyyy! Dagr has arrived! Time to
get this wind festival started!

I hate being tied down by duty
and that kind of thing.$k$pI need to be free to do whatever
I want—like the wind, I guess!
That's how I've always been.$k$pBut you can't just stick to what's
comfortable forever, right? Life has
more to offer than that!$k$pNótt would always say things like...
"Stand strong against headwinds!"
"Remember to be true to yourself!"$k$pLife may have its obstacles, but
nothing can take the freedom that
lives in my heart. I'll always have that.
This'll blow you away!
Storm's rollin' in...
Hold onto something!
Ssshhhooom!
Not bad...
Loook!
Finally, some fun! I've been waiting for something like this...
Oh, uh...musta been the wind... Hah! Nice try!
There sure are a lot of different tribes out there... I guess the jötnar are kind of like a tribe too, huh?
I may not know any wind magic, but the air this thing moves more than makes up for that!
Jötnar make great friends, right? Stand behind me, and the wind won't touch a hair on your head! Haha!
I love the sound of the wind... It reminds me of someone who isn't here anymore.
Don't you worry! Stick with Dagr and everything'll be fiiine!
Let's go!
Rrreally?
Like the wind!
